Class.name: Strix.Patches.ScrollableResultSet
Class.Description: A patched version of %ScrollableResultSet, to fix some bugs that can't be worked around in other ways.

Method.name: PopulateData
Method.Description: PopulateData originates in %ScrollableResultSet, and (if successfull) calls Close() (from %ResultSet) to close the original query. That method sets property IsOpened (also from %ResultSet) to 0. The result is that method OpenObject, which checks for IsOpened, no longer works. The fix is to set IsOpened back to 1 after PopulateData.
Method.Implementation: Set Status = ##super() If 'Status Quit Status Set i%IsOpened = 1 Quit $$$OK
